tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name TEXT NOT NULL, instructions TEXT NOT NULL, serving_size INT, cooking_time INT, cuisine TEXT, difficulty_level TEXT)
CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name TEXT NOT NULL, category TEXT, calories INT, protein FLOAT, carbs FLOAT, fat FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (recipe_id INT, ingredient_id INT, amount FLOAT, unit TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id))
